English: A game produced by Gloomy Cave Entertainment
Slide left finger to move XXXX monkey
Tap on right area to move Striker monkey
Shaker monkey make fruit rain. Try to hit the fruit before it falls to the ground.
If any fruit falls to the ground, close animals will get warned.
If alarm bar gets full, our mission will get aborted.
When the sack is full, empty it for more fruit.
Would you like to watch an advertisment for gold?
View full advertisement gives more gold...
